entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 8:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
